com.github.dandelion.core.html

Class AbstractHtmlTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.html.AbstractHtmlTag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlLink, HtmlScript

    public abstract class AbstractHtmlTag
extends Object
    Abstract superclass for all HTML tags.
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau
